attributes.action: More say for individuals. Online referendums please!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This site demonstrates the desire people have to affect a change.

However more should be done. It can be done more quickly. This site is too simple  and we have yet to see how effective it will be, but it's a start. 

Online applications such as this could prove a cornerstone for modernising democracy. 

We need more online public forums, conferences, votes - anything resembling referendums. More say!
